task.title: Attended Transfer
task.shortdesc: If you want to tell the new person about the caller's issue and give any background information before transferring the call, you can choose attended transfer.

context.p: Scenario: You (B) are talking with A, then transfer the call to C.

step.cmd: During the call with person A, dial *3 on your phone.
step.info: You will hear the prompt "transfer" and the dial tone.
C's phone is ringing. After C answers the call, the call between you and C is established. In this time, the call between you and A is held.

step.cmd: Hang up your call, the call between A and C is established.
